name: IOANNIS SAVVAIDIS
title: Computer Engineer and Composer
profile: Computer Engineer and Composer dedicated to building sustainable, reliable systems and exploring the intersection of technology and art. Experienced in managing large-scale production infrastructures with a focus on observability and performance while advocating for a respectful culture.
artistBio: Composer drawing on quantum and distributed computing principles to interpret relativistic reality and explore warped soundscapes driven by physical and abstract motion dynamics. Performs live, is a member of UNIX SYSTEMS, and has collaborated with record labels including Anopolis, June, Lower Parts, and Phormix.
engineerBio: Infrastructure Engineer with over a decade of experience in Site Reliability Engineering, focusing on building sustainable systems by cultivating a respectful culture and embracing a multidisciplinary approach to problem-solving. Currently, pursuing a Master's in Quantum Computing, exploring advanced computational methods.
